body_html:
I tried on window 10, visual studio 2017, GPU NVIDIA GTX 1070 but I got the following error

BUILD FAILED
"C:\tensorflow\tensorflow\contrib\cmake\build\tf_python_build_pip_package.vcxproj" (default target) (1)->
C:\tensorflow\tensorflow\contrib\cmake\build\tf_python_build_pip_package.vcxproj (32,3): error MSB4019:The imported project "c:/Micorsoft.Cpp.Default.props"
was not found. confirm that the path in the declaration is correct, and that file exists on disk.

body:
I tried on window 10, visual studio 2017, GPU NVIDIA GTX 1070 but I got the following error

BUILD FAILED
"C:\tensorflow\tensorflow\contrib\cmake\build\tf_python_build_pip_package.vcxproj" (default target) (1)->
C:\tensorflow\tensorflow\contrib\cmake\build\tf_python_build_pip_package.vcxproj (32,3): error MSB4019:The imported project "c:/Micorsoft.Cpp.Default.props" 
was not found. confirm that the path in the <import> declaration is correct, and that file exists on disk.
